sourcesContent:
import { Heading, Button, Paragraph, FadeIn, simpleWrapper, Container } from '../components/S' import HeaderDescription from '../components/HeaderDescription' import Head from 'next/head' export default ({ isHeb }) => { const welcome = 'Welcome, I am sincerely glad and hopeful you are finding this website of some useful utility for you and perhaps your friends or dear ones. The website is split between two goals that intersect with each other. As you can see there is plain data all over. Besides data, I wish the site to be as resourceful as needed and help people in variety of ways, be it online activities for the whole family or individuals, or vital information from news sources, or psychological tehcniques to help regulating anxiety and overwhelming emotions. Ways to cope with isolation and many more...' return ( <> Bonjour! This section of the site is an opportunity to meet the man behind the project, say hi, contribute in different possilbe ways, leave a constructing feedback regarding the website, state what you like and find helpful, and what you're missing about it and I'll look into it carefully.
You can Mail Me . Additionally, I recently added a donation feature to let you contribute by supporting me, obviously only if you like what I do and you find this place helpful. When I am not practicing web development and doing geeky stuff, I am usually concerned with either work or family. I am a father of a wonderful little girl whose at the moment of writing is 1y10m old, and a Husband with a lovely, supporting and loving wife who has been a part of assembling this project from day [0]. At work, I'm practicing as a social worker in the mental health field, a place that reminds me the importance of humility. ) }
